DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to demonstrate the efficacy of dianicline as an aid to smoking cessation in cigarette smokers. The main secondary objectives are: to assess the craving for cigarettes, nicotine withdrawal symptoms and the safety of dianicline.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Dianicline Versus Placebo as an Aid to Smoking Cessation
DOC.criteria: Outpatients over the legal age smoking at least 10 cigarettes per day for at least 2 months Insufficient level of motivation Another participant in the household Patients with current psychotic disorder or major depressive disorder The investigator will evaluate whether there are other reasons why a patient may not participate.
